Templates.template:
new sap.ui.vtm.Column(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		tooltip: ${tooltip}, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase
		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData
		dependents: [${dependents}], // sap.ui.core.Element[]
		dragDropConfig: [${dragDropConfig}], // sap.ui.core.dnd.DragDropBase[]
		fieldHelpDisplay: ${fieldHelpDisplay}, // (sap.ui.core.Element|string)
		type: ${type}, // sap.ui.vtm.ColumnType
		descriptor: "${descriptor}", // string
		tooltip: "${tooltip}", // string
		hAlign: ${sap.ui.core.HorizontalAlign.Left}, // sap.ui.core.HorizontalAlign
		width: ${"200px"}, // sap.ui.core.CSSSize
		resizable: ${bResizable}, // boolean
		label: "${label}", // string
		labelControl: ${labelControl}, // object
		valueFormatter: ${valueFormatter}, // any
		tooltipFormatter: ${tooltipFormatter}, // any
		template: ${template} // sap.ui.core.Control
	}
)
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new Column. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getType type} : sap.ui.vtm.ColumnType
    • {@link #getDescriptor descriptor} : string
    • {@link #getTooltip tooltip} : string
    • {@link #getHAlign hAlign} : sap.ui.core.HorizontalAlign (default: "Left")
    • {@link #getWidth width} : sap.ui.core.CSSSize (default: "200px")
    • {@link #getResizable resizable} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getLabel label} : string
    • {@link #getLabelControl labelControl} : object
    • {@link #getValueFormatter valueFormatter} : any
    • {@link #getTooltipFormatter tooltipFormatter} : any
    • {@link #getTemplate template} : sap.ui.core.Control
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Element#constructor sap.ui.core.Element} can be used as well.
Templates.name: sap.ui.vtm.Column
Templates.helpDescription: Experimental!

Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new DisplayGroup. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Element#constructor sap.ui.core.Element} can be used as well.

new sap.ui.vtm.Extension(

		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object

		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array

		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData

		dragDropConfig: [${dragDropConfig}], // sap.ui.core.dnd.DragDropBase[]
		fieldHelpDisplay: ${fieldHelpDisplay}, // (sap.ui.core.Element|string)

		initialized: [function (oEvent) {}, this] // function|array

Templates.constructorDescription:
This class is an abstract class that is not intended to be instantiated directly. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getEnabled enabled} : boolean (default: true)
  • Events
    • {@link #event:enabledChanged enabledChanged} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:initialized initialized} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Element#constructor sap.ui.core.Element} can be used as well.
Templates.name: sap.ui.vtm.Extension
Templates.helpDescription: Experimental!

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.vtm.Panel(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		tooltip: ${tooltip}, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase
		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData
		dependents: [${dependents}], // sap.ui.core.Element[]
		dragDropConfig: [${dragDropConfig}], // sap.ui.core.dnd.DragDropBase[]
		fieldHelpDisplay: ${fieldHelpDisplay}, // (sap.ui.core.Element|string)
		blocked: ${bBlocked}, // boolean
		busy: ${bBusy}, // boolean
		busyIndicatorDelay: ${1000}, // int
		busyIndicatorSize: ${sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize.Medium}, // sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize
		visible: ${bVisible}, // boolean
		fieldGroupIds: [${fieldGroupIds}], // string[]
		validateFieldGroup: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		title: "${title}", // string
		showViewport: ${bShowViewport}, // boolean
		treeWidth: ${"50%"}, // sap.ui.core.CSSSize
		height: ${"inherit"}, // sap.ui.core.CSSSize
		titleControls: [${titleControls}], // sap.ui.core.Control[]
		treeHeaderControls: [${treeHeaderControls}], // sap.ui.core.Control[]
		viewportHeaderControls: [${viewportHeaderControls}], // sap.ui.core.Control[]
		vtmId: ${vtmId}, // (sap.ui.vtm.Vtm|string)
		initialized: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		contextMenu: [function (oEvent) {}, this] // function|array
	}
)
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new Panel. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getTitle title} : string
    • {@link #getShowViewport showViewport} : boolean (default: true)
    • {@link #getTreeWidth treeWidth} : sap.ui.core.CSSSize (default: "50%")
    • {@link #getHeight height} : sap.ui.core.CSSSize (default: "inherit")
  • Aggregations
    • {@link #getTitleControls titleControls} : sap.ui.core.Control[]
    • {@link #getTreeHeaderControls treeHeaderControls} : sap.ui.core.Control[]
    • {@link #getViewportHeaderControls viewportHeaderControls} : sap.ui.core.Control[]
  • Associations
    • {@link #getVtmId vtmId} : (sap.ui.core.ID | sap.ui.vtm.Vtm)
  • Events
    • {@link #event:initialized initialized} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:contextMenu contextMenu} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Control#constructor sap.ui.core.Control} can be used as well.
Templates.name: sap.ui.vtm.Panel
Templates.helpDescription: Experimental!

Templates.template:
fireContextMenu(
	{
		clientX: ${clientX}, // int
		clientY: ${clientY}, // int
		pageX: ${pageX}, // int
		pageY: ${pageY}, // int
		screenX: ${screenX}, // int
		screenY: ${screenY}, // int
		eventData: ${eventData} // object
	}
)
Templates.name: sap.ui.vtm.Panel.fireContextMenu
Templates.helpDescription: Fires event {@link #event:contextMenu contextMenu} to attached listeners. Listeners may prevent the default action of this event by calling the preventDefault method on the event object. The return value of this method indicates whether the default action should be executed.

new sap.ui.vtm.SceneNode(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID

		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array

		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array

		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData
		dependents: [${dependents}], // sap.ui.core.Element[]
		dragDropConfig: [${dragDropConfig}], // sap.ui.core.dnd.DragDropBase[]

		scene: ${scene} // object
	}

Templates.constructorDescription:
This class is not intended to be directly instantiated by application code. The scene traversal methods ({@link sap.ui.vtm.Scene#traverseTree traverseTree}, {@link sap.ui.vtm.Scene#traverseBranch traverseBranch}, {@link sap.ui.vtm.Scene#traverseNodes traverseNodes}) should be used to access scene nodes Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getSceneNodeId sceneNodeId} : string
    • {@link #getScene scene} : object
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Element#constructor sap.ui.core.Element} can be used as well.
Templates.name: sap.ui.vtm.SceneNode
Templates.helpDescription: Experimental!

new sap.ui.vtm.Tree(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object

		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object

		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		tooltip: ${tooltip}, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase
		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData
		dependents: [${dependents}], // sap.ui.core.Element[]
		dragDropConfig: [${dragDropConfig}], // sap.ui.core.dnd.DragDropBase[]
		fieldHelpDisplay: ${fieldHelpDisplay}, // (sap.ui.core.Element|string)

		busy: ${bBusy}, // boolean
		busyIndicatorDelay: ${1000}, // int
		busyIndicatorSize: ${sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize.Medium}, // sap.ui.core.BusyIndicatorSize
		visible: ${bVisible}, // boolean
		fieldGroupIds: [${fieldGroupIds}], // string[]
		validateFieldGroup: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		selectionMode: ${sap.ui.vtm.SelectionMode.Single}, // sap.ui.vtm.SelectionMode
		headerControls: [${headerControls}], // sap.ui.core.Control[]
		dragStart: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		dragOver: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		drop: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		selectionChanged: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		visibilityHeaderIconClicked: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		visibilityIconClicked: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		expandedChanged: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		fixedColumnsChanged: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		dataColumnsChanged: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		beforeModelUpdated: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelUpdated: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		messageStatusIconClicked: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		messageStatusHeaderIconClicked: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		hierarchyChanged: [function (oEvent) {}, this] // function|array
	}
)
Templates.constructorDescription:
This class is not intended to be instantiated directly by application code. A {@link sap.ui.vtm.Tree} object is created when a {@link sap.ui.vtm.Panel} object is instantiated. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getSelectionMode selectionMode} : sap.ui.vtm.SelectionMode (default: "Single")
  • Aggregations
    • {@link #getHeaderControls headerControls} : sap.ui.core.Control[]
  • Events
    • {@link #event:dragStart dragStart} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:dragOver dragOver} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:drop drop} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:selectionChanged selectionChanged} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:visibilityHeaderIconClicked visibilityHeaderIconClicked} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:visibilityIconClicked visibilityIconClicked} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:expandedChanged expandedChanged} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:fixedColumnsChanged fixedColumnsChanged} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:dataColumnsChanged dataColumnsChanged} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:beforeModelUpdated beforeModelUpdated} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:modelUpdated modelUpdated} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:messageStatusIconClicked messageStatusIconClicked} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:messageStatusHeaderIconClicked messageStatusHeaderIconClicked} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:hierarchyChanged hierarchyChanged} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Control#constructor sap.ui.core.Control} can be used as well.
Templates.name: sap.ui.vtm.Tree
Templates.helpDescription: Experimental!

Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new Viewable. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

    • {@link #getSource source} : any
    • {@link #getName name} : string
    • {@link #getRootNodeIds rootNodeIds} : string[]
    • {@link #getRelativeMatrix relativeMatrix} : sap.ui.vtm.Matrix
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Element#constructor sap.ui.core.Element} can be used as well.

Templates.template:
new sap.ui.vtm.Vtm(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
		objectBindings: ${objectBindings}, // object
		metadataContexts: ${metadataContexts}, // object
		validationSuccess: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		validationError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		parseError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		formatError: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		modelContextChange: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		tooltip: ${tooltip}, // sap.ui.core.TooltipBase
		customData: [${customData}], // sap.ui.core.CustomData[]
		layoutData: ${layoutData}, // sap.ui.core.LayoutData
		dependents: [${dependents}], // sap.ui.core.Element[]
		dragDropConfig: [${dragDropConfig}], // sap.ui.core.dnd.DragDropBase[]
		fieldHelpDisplay: ${fieldHelpDisplay}, // (sap.ui.core.Element|string)
		addDefaultExtensions: ${bAddDefaultExtensions}, // boolean
		extensions: [${extensions}], // sap.ui.vtm.Extension[]
		panelAdded: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		activePanelChanged: [function (oEvent) {}, this], // function|array
		initialized: [function (oEvent) {}, this] // function|array
	}
)
Templates.constructorDescription:
Constructor for a new Vtm. This constructor can be used to construct an instance of {@link sap.ui.vtm.Vtm} with a specific set of extensions. Alternatively {@link sap.ui.vtm.createVtm} can be used to create a {@link sap.ui.vtm.Vtm} instance with a default set of extensions. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

The supported settings are:

  • Properties
    • {@link #getAddDefaultExtensions addDefaultExtensions} : boolean
  • Aggregations
    • {@link #getExtensions extensions} : sap.ui.vtm.Extension[] (default)
  • Events
    • {@link #event:panelAdded panelAdded} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:activePanelChanged activePanelChanged} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
    • {@link #event:initialized initialized} : fnListenerFunction or [fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject] or [oData, fnListenerFunction, oListenerObject]
In addition, all settings applicable to the base type {@link sap.ui.core.Element#constructor sap.ui.core.Element} can be used as well.
Templates.name: sap.ui.vtm.Vtm
Templates.helpDescription: Experimental!

Templates.name: sap.ui.vtm.Vtm.firePanelAdded
Templates.helpDescription: Fires event {@link #event:panelAdded panelAdded} to attached listeners.

new sap.ui.vtm.extensions.DisplayStateCalculationExtension(
	"${sId}", // string
	{
		id: ${id}, // sap.ui.core.ID
		models: ${models}, // object
		bindingContexts: ${bindingContexts}, // object
